title: Gifting in the New Client
body: Does gifting not work for everyone?

replies.body:
Gifting hasn't been brought into the new client just yet. You'll have to do your gifting through the Legacy Client for now. If you don't know how to launch the Legacy Client, you can do so directly from the login screen of the Beta Client, as shown below:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if you have any questions.
